name: Amerak Rpg: The Food Magician
description:
Fight monsters and answer questions about food ! Find new treasures and activate specials in buckets of water! Find conversation starters. 

Important* : When fighting monsters, please do not click other buttons like item,skills or guard. JUST CLICK ATTACK. If not, the game will hang. There is NO BACK BUTTON.  If the questions repeat, that is normal sometimes. 

SAVE comes in secret holes. So have fun exploring the items.
